
#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/blood2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3)
    {
        if(frame==1)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/water1.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==5)
    {
        if(frame==4)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/heart.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==8)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0.1, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0.4, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", -0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", -0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==16)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==19)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==20)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", -0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==23)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==24)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==27)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==28)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", -0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==31)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==32)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==35)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==36)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", -0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==39)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==40)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==43)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==44)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", -0.5, 0, 0.5);
        }
        if(frame==47)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/ballclear.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==10)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==11)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==12)
    {
        if(frame==21)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==13)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/barelclear.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==15)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==16)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==17)
    {
        if(frame==24)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==20)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/bombclear.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==27)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.30);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==28)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.30);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==31)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

        return;

            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
        }
        return;

        {

        }
        return;

        }

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/dynamclear.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==49)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.30);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==50)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.30);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==53)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/knifeclear.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==55)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            basechange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==59)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/rockclear.txt

void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==61)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==62)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==63)
    {
        if(frame==21)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==64)

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/woodclear.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==79)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==80)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==81)
    {
        if(frame==21)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/billy.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==85)
    {

    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int eTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
      changeentityproperty(P1, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(P1, "invinctime", eTime + 340);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
      changeentityproperty(P2, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(P2, "invinctime", eTime + 340);
    }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            spawnbind2("parrow", "parrow2", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==86)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int eTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "invinctime", eTime + 400);
      changeentityproperty(self, "blink", 1);
    }
    if(frame==8){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 1.2, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 1.7, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            spawnbind2("parrow", "parrow2", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 1.7, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            Join(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==87)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int eTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "invinctime", eTime + 400);
      changeentityproperty(self, "blink", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            Join(0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            spawnbind2("parrow", "parrow2", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==88)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int eTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "invinctime", eTime + 400);
      changeentityproperty(self, "blink", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            Join(0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            spawnbind2("parrow", "parrow2", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==89)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int eTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

    if(frame==18){
      changeentityproperty(self, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "invinctime", eTime + 400);
      changeentityproperty(self, "blink", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 1.7, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==19)
        {
            Join(0);
        }
        if(frame==19)
        {
            spawnbind2("parrow", "parrow2", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==90)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int eTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

    if(frame==7){
      changeentityproperty(self, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "invinctime", eTime + 400);
      changeentityproperty(self, "blink", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_Screen", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 1.2, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            Join(0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            spawnbind2("parrow", "parrow2", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==91)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int eTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");
    int Offset = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset);
    }
    if(frame==11){
      changeentityproperty(self, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "invinctime", eTime + 400);
      changeentityproperty(self, "blink", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_Screen", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 1.2, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            Join(0);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            spawnbind2("parrow", "parrow2", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==92)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int eTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

    if(frame==13){
      changeentityproperty(self, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "invinctime", eTime + 400);
      changeentityproperty(self, "blink", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 1.7, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==14)
        {
            Join(0);
        }
        if(frame==14)
        {
            spawnbind2("parrow", "parrow2", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==93)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int eTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");
    int Offset = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 999);
    }
    if(frame==11){
      changeentityproperty(self, "invincible", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "invinctime", eTime + 400);
      changeentityproperty(self, "blink", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_Screen", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 1.2, 0, 0);
        }

      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

        sx = -5;
      }

        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW51"));

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bbat.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==244)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==245)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==246)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("U", "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("D", "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==247)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==248)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==249)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){

            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("batclear", 25, 20, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==297)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("batclear", 25, 20, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==301)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nograb(1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==302)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            ani0020(openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"), ANI_PAIN_STUN_FRONT);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            finisher("ANI_PAIN2", "ANI_FOLLOW2", -180, 45, 50, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==303)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.20);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==17)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==304)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            ani0020(ANI_DRAGON_TKD_FINISH, ANI_PAIN_STUN_FRONT);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 70, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==305)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", ANI_DRAGON_TKD_FINISH_2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==306)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==307)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(20, "ANI_FOLLOW113");
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bwhip.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==309)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==310)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==311)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("U", "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("D", "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==312)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==313)
    {

      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW51"));

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/knife.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==379)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            move(25, 0, 40);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            basechange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==383)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/knife1.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==384)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==385)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      killentity(self);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==386)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.30);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 100, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            shooter2("knife", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==387)
    {

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.30);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            shooter2("knife", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==388)
    {
        if(frame==1)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==391)
    {

        }

    }

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bknife.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==393)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==394)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==395)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("U", "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("D", "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==396)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==397)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==398)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==399)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW22", 0, "U", 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW23", 0, "D", 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW22", 0, "U", 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW23", 0, "D", 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==400)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {

        }

        }

        }

    }
    if(animhandle==403)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {

        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW23", 0, "D", 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW22", 0, "U", 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/barel.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==459)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            move(5, 0, 110);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -5);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==460)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==461)
    {
        if(frame==24)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==464)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bbarel.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==470)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==471)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==472)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==473)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==474)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==475)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nomoveidle2("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==476)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt8(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==477)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -31, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            shooter2("barel1", 30, 120, 1, 1.5, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==479)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("barelclear", 5, 95, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==480)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("barelclear", 5, 95, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==481)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("barelclear", 5, 95, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==482)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("barelclear", 5, 95, 1);
        }
        return;

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/dynam.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==535)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.10);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-0.20);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==536)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.30);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==537)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            move(25, 0, 40);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.30);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==14)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==14)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==16)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==16)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==540)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==541)
    {
        if(frame==10)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bdynam.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==542)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==543)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==544)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("U", "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("D", "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==545)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);

      int LType = getentityvar(self, 6);
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW51"));
    }
        return;

    if(frame==0){

      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "velocity", 0, 0 , 0); // This is to stop entity from moving forward
      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "tosstime", iTime + 90);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.20);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==587)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==589)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==590)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera2();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==591)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("dynamclear", 25, 40, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==592)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("dynamclear", 25, 40, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==593)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("dynamclear", 25, 40, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==594)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("dynamclear", 25, 40, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==598)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.20);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==17)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==599)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nograb(1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==600)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            ani0020(openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"), ANI_PAIN_STUN_FRONT);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            finisher("ANI_PAIN2", "ANI_FOLLOW2", -180, 45, 50, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==601)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            ani0020(ANI_DRAGON_TKD_FINISH, ANI_PAIN_STUN_FRONT);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 70, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==602)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", ANI_DRAGON_TKD_FINISH_2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==603)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==604)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(20, "ANI_FOLLOW113");
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/wood.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==608)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            move(5, 0, 110);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -5);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==609)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==610)
    {
        if(frame==21)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==613)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bwood.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==619)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==620)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==621)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==622)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==623)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==624)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nomoveidle2("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==625)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt8(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==626)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -31, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            shooter2("wood1", 30, 120, 1, 1.5, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==628)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("woodclear", 5, 95, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==629)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("woodclear", 5, 95, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==630)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("woodclear", 5, 95, 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==631)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            spawn01("woodclear", 5, 95, 1);
        }
        return;
    }

        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bchain.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==680)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==681)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==682)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("U", "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("D", "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==683)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==684)
    {

      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);

      if(Dir == 0){

      if(LType == 2){

          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
        }
            if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==721)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==722)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==723)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(20, "ANI_FOLLOW113");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==724)
    {

    void vSelf = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      int  iTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "velocity", 0, 0 , 0); // This is to stop entity from moving forward
      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "tosstime", iTime + 160);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==725)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.27);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==727)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==728)
    {

    void vSelf = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      int  iTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "velocity", 0, 0 , 0); // This is to stop entity from moving forward
      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "tosstime", iTime + 90);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.20);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==729)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==731)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==732)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            degravity(-1);

        if(frame==0)

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==733)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stwall(1, 0, 0);
        }

        }
        return;
    }

        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==17)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==741)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nograb(1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==742)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            ani0020(openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"), ANI_PAIN_STUN_FRONT);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            finisher("ANI_PAIN2", "ANI_FOLLOW2", -180, 45, 50, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==743)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            ani0020(ANI_DRAGON_TKD_FINISH, ANI_PAIN_STUN_FRONT);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 70, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==744)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", ANI_DRAGON_TKD_FINISH_2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==745)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==746)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(20, "ANI_FOLLOW113");
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bshovel.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==748)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==749)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==750)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("U", "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("D", "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==751)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==752)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {

        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");

        }

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==753)
    {

    }
    if(frame==3){

    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==754)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW22", 0, "U", 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)

            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW23", 0, "D", 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW22", 0, "U", 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW23", 0, "D", 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==755)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            dasher(0, 0, 0);

            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber3(5, 0, "ANI_FOLLOW33");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW31", 0, "L", 1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==765)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(1.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber3(5, 0, "ANI_FOLLOW32");
        }
        if(frame==0)

        }
        if(frame==1)

        }

        }

    {

    if(frame==1){
      void self = getlocalvar("self");
//      int iPIndex = getentityproperty(self,"playerindex");
//      int LType = getglobalvar(iPIndex+"ClimbT");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 6);
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW51"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==767)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW5");
        }
        return;
    }
