#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/bomb2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==813)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/bomb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==817)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.10);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-0.20);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==818)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      killentity(self);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==819)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.30);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==820)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            move(25, 0, 40);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.30);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            antiwall6(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            antiwall6(0, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==14)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==14)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            antiwall4(10, -10);
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -10);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==823)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==824)
    {
        if(frame==10)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bbomb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==825)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==826)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==827)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("U", "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("D", "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==828)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==829)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber(20, 10, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==830)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==831)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW22", 0, "U", 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW23", 0, "D", 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyint2("ANI_FOLLOW22", 0, "U", 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {

        if(frame==9)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==17)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==882)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nograb(1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==883)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            ani0020(openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"), ANI_PAIN_STUN_FRONT);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            finisher("ANI_PAIN2", "ANI_FOLLOW2", -180, 45, 50, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==884)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            ani0020(ANI_DRAGON_TKD_FINISH, ANI_PAIN_STUN_FRONT);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 70, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==885)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", ANI_DRAGON_TKD_FINISH_2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==886)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dc_direction_flip(NULL());
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==887)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(20, "ANI_FOLLOW113");
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/billy/bstick.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==889)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==890)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 0);
    }
    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==891)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("U", "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            keyclimb("D", "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==892)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        if(frame==3)

            climberD(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW21");

      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {

      }

        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickObject("ANI_FOLLOW4", 0, 50, 30);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            finisher("ANI_PAIN2", "ANI_FOLLOW1", 0, 180, 50, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 70, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 70, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==921)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            ani0020(openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW7"), openborconstant("ANI_PAIN15"));
        }
        if(frame==0)

        }
        if(frame==2)
        {

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==922)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            antiwall3(55, -20, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall3(83, -20, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(83, -11, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)

            shootObject(50, 1, 0, 1.5, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==923)
    {
        if(frame==2)

        }
        return;
    }

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==927)

        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==934)
    {

        void self = getlocalvar("self");

          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
        }
            if(frame==0)
        {
            camera();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==935)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==936)
    {

        }
        return;
    }

    {

            antiwall4(20, "ANI_FOLLOW113");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==938)
    {

    void vSelf = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      int  iTime = openborvariant("elapsed_time");

      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "velocity", 0, 0 , 0); // This is to stop entity from moving forward
      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "tosstime", iTime + 160);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==939)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.27);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }

        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==941)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==942)
    {

    if(frame==0){

      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "velocity", 0, 0 , 0); // This is to stop entity from moving forward
      changeentityproperty(vSelf, "tosstime", iTime + 90);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.20);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            knife(75, 20, 0, 90, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)

        }

        }
        if(frame==3)

        }

    }

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/bilend/bilend.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==964)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==966)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==3){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -300 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", 320 - Offset2);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==967)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==3){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -300 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", 320 - Offset2);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==968)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nomoveidle2("ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==969)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==971)
    {
        if(frame==2)
        {
            spawn01("heart", 16, 108, -1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==972)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -300 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", 320 - Offset2);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            direc(0);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/bilend/bilend2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==977)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==979)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==3){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -300 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", 320 - Offset2);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==980)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==3){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -300 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", 320 - Offset2);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==981)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nomoveidle2("ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==982)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }

        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==985)

    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -300 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", 320 - Offset2);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            direc(0);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/bilend/bilend3.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==990)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==992)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==3){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", -320 + Offset2);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==993)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==3){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", -320 + Offset2);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==994)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nomoveidle2("ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==995)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==996)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P1){
      changeentityproperty(P1, "colourmap", 2);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            direc(1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==997)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==998)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==999)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, -1);
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==14)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW4"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1000)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1001)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==16)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==17)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1002)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW7"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1003)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1004)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1005)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW7"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1006)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW4"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1011)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Pm;

      if(P1){
        Pm = getentityproperty(P1,"map");
      } else if(P2){
        Pm = getentityproperty(P2,"map");
      }

      if(Pm == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1m = getentityproperty(P1,"map");
      int P2m = getentityproperty(P2,"map");

      if(P1m == 2 && P2m == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1012)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Pm;

      if(P1){
        Pm = getentityproperty(P1,"map");
      } else if(P2){
        Pm = getentityproperty(P2,"map");
      }

      if(Pm == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW4"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1m = getentityproperty(P1,"map");
      int P2m = getentityproperty(P2,"map");

      if(P1m == 2 && P2m == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW4"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1013)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Pm;

      if(P1){
        Pm = getentityproperty(P1,"map");
      } else if(P2){
        Pm = getentityproperty(P2,"map");
      }

      if(Pm == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1m = getentityproperty(P1,"map");
      int P2m = getentityproperty(P2,"map");

      if(P1m == 2 && P2m == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/bilend/bilend4.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1014)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            Join(1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1016)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==3){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", -320 + Offset2);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1017)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Offset2 = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==3){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
      changelevelproperty("cameraxoffset", -320 + Offset2);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1018)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            nomoveidle2("ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1019)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1020)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");

    if(P2){
      changeentityproperty(P2, "colourmap", 2);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            direc(1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1021)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1022)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1023)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, -1);
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==14)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW4"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1024)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Offset1 = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(frame==0){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
      changelevelproperty("camerazoffset", -100 - Offset1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1025)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==16)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==17)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1026)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW7"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1027)
    {

      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);

    }
        if(frame==0)

            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {

        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW4"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1035)
    {

    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Pm;

      if(P1){
        Pm = getentityproperty(P1,"map");
      } else if(P2){
        Pm = getentityproperty(P2,"map");
      }

      if(Pm == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1m = getentityproperty(P1,"map");
      int P2m = getentityproperty(P2,"map");

      if(P1m == 2 && P2m == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/barel2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1038)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 2+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            leaper(1.3, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            leaper(0.7, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            leaper(0.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            leaper(0.3, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1040)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/wood2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1041)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 2+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1.7, 1.3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1042)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 2+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            leaper(1, 1.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            leaper(0.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1044)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/box2.txt
