void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1045)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 2+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            leaper(1.3, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            leaper(0.7, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            leaper(0.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==12)
        {
            leaper(0.3, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1047)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/boxx2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1048)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 2+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1.7, 1.3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1049)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 2+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            leaper(1, 1.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            leaper(0.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1051)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/rock2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1052)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 2+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            leaper(0.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            leaper(0.2, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==13)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1053)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/ball2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1054)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 2+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1.7, 1.3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1055)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 2+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            leaper(1, 1.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            leaper(1, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            leaper(0.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1057)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper/broper.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1058)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1059)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1060)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1061)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1062)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1065)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1066)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1067)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1068)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1069)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1070)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1071)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1072)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1073)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1076)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1077)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1079)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1080)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1083)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1084)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/knife2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1085)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            antiwall4(10, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1086)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      killentity(self);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1087)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.30);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            knife(20, 20, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            shooter2("knife", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1088)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.30);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            shooter2("knife", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1089)
    {
        if(frame==1)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1092)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper/kroper.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1093)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1094)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1095)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1096)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1097)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1100)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1101)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1102)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1103)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1104)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1105)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1106)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1107)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1108)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1110)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1111)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1112)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1113)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW17");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1114)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW18");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1115)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1116)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1117)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1121)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1122)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1123)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1124)
    {
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("knife2", 30, 80, 0, 4, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1126)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1127)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper/droper.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1128)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1129)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1130)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1131)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1132)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1135)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1136)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1137)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1138)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1139)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1140)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1141)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1142)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1143)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)

            degravity(-1);
        }

        }
        if(frame==0)

            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1149)

        if(frame==0)

        if(frame==0)

            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper/sroper.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1163)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1164)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1165)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1166)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1167)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1170)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1171)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1172)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1173)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1174)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1175)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1176)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1177)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1178)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1181)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1182)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1184)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1185)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1188)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1189)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/barel3.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1190)
    {
        if(frame==8)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1191)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1192)
    {
        if(frame==39)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1194)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper/rbarel.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1195)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1201)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1202)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -31, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            shooter2("barel3", 30, 120, 1, 1.5, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

}

{

    if(animhandle==1208)
    {

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1214)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1215)

            antiwall3(35, -31, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            shooter2("box3", 30, 120, 1, 1.5, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper/boroper.txt

void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1228)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1229)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1230)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1231)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1232)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1235)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1236)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1237)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1238)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1239)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1240)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1241)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1242)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1243)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1245)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1246)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1247)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1248)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW17");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1249)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW18");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1250)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1251)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1252)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1256)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1257)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1258)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1259)
    {
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("bomb", 20, 80, 0, 3.5, 3, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1261)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1262)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/boxx3.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1263)
    {
        if(frame==8)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW1"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1264)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW2"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1265)
    {
        if(frame==41)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1267)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper/rboxx.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1268)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1274)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1275)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -31, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            shooter2("boxx3", 30, 120, 1, 1.5, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

}
