#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper2/broperb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1301)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1302)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1303)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1304)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1307)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1308)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1309)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1310)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1311)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1312)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1313)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1314)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1315)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1318)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1319)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%80;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW30"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1321)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1322)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1323)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW32");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW33");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1324)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW24");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1325)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1326)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW32");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1327)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW34");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW35");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1328)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW35");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1332)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1333)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper2/kroperb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1334)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1335)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1336)
    {

    if(frame==3){

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(animhandle==1342)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+640){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+640 && P2x <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1343)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){

        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");

        if(Px <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+640){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+640 && P2x <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1346)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1347)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }

            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)

            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");

    {

      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;

    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);

        }

        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)

        }

    if(animhandle==1379)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper2/droperb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1380)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1381)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1382)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1383)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;

    if(animhandle==1384)

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);

    if(animhandle==1385)

    }

        }

    if(animhandle==1388)

    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+640){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+640 && P2x <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1389)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+640){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+640 && P2x <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1392)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1393)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1394)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1395)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1396)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1397)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1398)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1399)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1400)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1402)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1403)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1404)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%80;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW30"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)

            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");

    }

        return;

    if(animhandle==1406)

        if(frame==0)

        }

    if(animhandle==1407)

        return;

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1409)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1413)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1414)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1415)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1416)
    {
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("dynam", 20, 80, 0, 3.5, 3, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1417)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW32");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW33");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1418)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW33");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1420)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW34");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW35");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1421)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW35");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1424)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1425)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper2/sroperb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1426)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1427)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1428)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1429)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;

    if(animhandle==1430)

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1433)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1434)

      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");

      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1441)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1444)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1445)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%80;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW30"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1447)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1448)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1449)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW32");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW33");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1450)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW24");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1451)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1453)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW34");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW35");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1454)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW35");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1458)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1459)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper2/rbarelb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1460)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1466)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1467)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -31, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            shooter2("barel3", 30, 120, 1, 1.5, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

}

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);

#### animationscript function main #####

void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1484)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1485)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1486)
    {

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1487)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);

    }

        }

    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1490)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)

            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1491)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1492)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+640){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+640 && P2x <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1493)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+640){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+640 && P2x <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1496)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1497)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1498)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1499)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1500)
    {

      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1501)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)

            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");

        }

        }

        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1503)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1504)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1506)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1507)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1508)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%80;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW30"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1509)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW17");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1510)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW18");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1511)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1512)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1513)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1517)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1518)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1519)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1520)
    {
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("bomb", 20, 80, 0, 3.5, 3, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1521)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW32");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW33");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1522)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW33");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1524)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW34");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW35");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1525)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW35");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1528)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1529)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper2/rboxxb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1530)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1536)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1537)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -31, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            shooter2("boxx3", 30, 120, 1, 1.5, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams/batliams.txt

void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1554)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1555)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1556)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1557)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1558)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Hole", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1561)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1562)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1563)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Hole", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1564)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1565)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1566)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1567)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1568)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1569)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1572)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1573)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1575)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1576)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1578)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1579)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams/svliams.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1580)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1581)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);

        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");

            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");

            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");

        }

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);

      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));

        return;

    if(animhandle==1592)
    {
