        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1593)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1594)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1595)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1598)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1599)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1601)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1602)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1604)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1605)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams/kniliams.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1606)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1607)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1608)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1609)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1610)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(-250, 250, 100, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1611)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1612)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1613)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Hole", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-250, 250, -20, 120, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1614)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(-259, 259, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1615)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1616)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      }

      if(Px <= x+100){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");

      if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+100){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+409){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+409 && P2x <= x+100){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1617)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      }

      if(Px <= x+250){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");

      if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+250){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+549){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+549 && P2x <= x+250){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1618)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      }

      if(Px >= x-150){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");

      if(P1x >= x-150 && P2x >= x-150){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      } else if(P1x >= x-150 && P2x >= x-300){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      } else if(P1x >= x-300 && P2x >= x-150){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            direc(1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1619)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);

            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1625)

        if(frame==0)

        if(frame==3)

        }
        if(frame==4)

        }
        if(frame==4)

            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)

        if(frame==5)

        }
        if(frame==6)

            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1629)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1630)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }

    }
    if(animhandle==1632)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1633)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1634)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%40;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW26"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1635)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1636)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1640)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1641)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1642)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1643)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW30");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1644)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 2){
      int r = rand()%30;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW32"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW31");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1645)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1646)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1649)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1650)
    {
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("knife2", 30, 80, 0, 4, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1652)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1653)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams/dynliams.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1654)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1655)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1656)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1657)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1658)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(-250, 250, 100, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1659)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1660)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Hole", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-250, 250, -20, 120, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1661)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1662)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(-259, 259, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1663)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1664)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      }

      if(Px <= x+100){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");

      if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+100){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+409){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+409 && P2x <= x+100){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1665)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){

        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      }

      if(Px <= x+250){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");

      if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+250){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+549){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+549 && P2x <= x+250){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1666)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }

      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");

      if(P1x >= x-150 && P2x >= x-150){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      } else if(P1x >= x-150 && P2x >= x-300){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      } else if(P1x >= x-300 && P2x >= x-150){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      }

        {
            direc(1);
        }
        return;

        }
        if(frame==7)

            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }

    if(animhandle==1677)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
