        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1684)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1688)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1689)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1690)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1691)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW30");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1692)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 2){
      int r = rand()%30;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW32"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW31");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1693)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1694)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1697)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1698)
    {
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("dynam", 20, 80, 0, 3.5, 3, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1700)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1701)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams/boliams.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1702)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1703)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1704)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1705)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1706)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(-250, 250, 100, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1707)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1708)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1709)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Hole", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-250, 250, -20, 120, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1710)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(-259, 259, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1711)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1712)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      }

      if(Px >= x-150){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");

      if(P1x >= x-150 && P2x >= x-150){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      } else if(P1x >= x-150 && P2x >= x-300){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      } else if(P1x >= x-300 && P2x >= x-150){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW63"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            direc(1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1713)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            direc(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1716)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1717)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1718)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Hole", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1719)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1720)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1721)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1722)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1723)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1724)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1726)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1727)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1728)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%40;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW26"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1729)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1730)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1734)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1735)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1736)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1737)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW30");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1738)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 2){
      int r = rand()%30;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW32"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW31");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1739)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1740)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1743)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1744)
    {
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("bomb", 20, 80, 0, 3.5, 3, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1746)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1747)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams2/batliamsb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1748)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1749)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1750)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1751)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+110){
        if(Px <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+110 && P2z <= z+110){
        if(P1x <= x+300 && P2x <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1752)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1753)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1756)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1757)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1759)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1760)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1761)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1762)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1763)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1764)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1765)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1768)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1769)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1771)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1772)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1774)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1775)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams2/svliamsb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1776)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1777)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1778)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1779)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+110){
        if(Px <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+110 && P2z <= z+110){
        if(P1x <= x+300 && P2x <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1780)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1781)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1784)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1785)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1787)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1788)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1789)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1790)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1791)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1792)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1793)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1796)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1797)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1799)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1800)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1802)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1803)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams2/kniliamsb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1804)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1805)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1806)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1807)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1808)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1809)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 100, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1810)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+110){
        if(Px <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+110 && P2z <= z+110){
        if(P1x <= x+300 && P2x <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1811)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1812)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1815)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1816)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1818)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1819)
    {

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1820)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1821)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1822)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)

            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)

            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");

        }
        if(frame==6)

        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1823)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1824)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1826)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1827)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1828)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%40;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW26"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1829)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1830)
    {
        if(frame==0)

        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;

    {

        }

    }
    if(animhandle==1844)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%40;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW33"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("knife2", 30, 80, 0, 4, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1845)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.27);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            shooter2("knife2", 30, 80, 0, 4, -3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1846)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");
    int dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int Vx = getentityproperty(self, "xdir");

    if(y > 1+b && dir == 0 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }else if (y > 1+b && dir == 1 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1847)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");
    int dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int Vx = getentityproperty(self, "xdir");

    if(y > 1+b && dir == 0 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }else if (y > 1+b && dir == 1 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1849)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1850)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams2/dynliamsb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1851)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1852)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1853)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1854)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1855)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1856)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 100, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1857)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+110){
        if(Px <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+110 && P2z <= z+110){
        if(P1x <= x+300 && P2x <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1858)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1859)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1862)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1863)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {

        }

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1866)
    {

    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1867)
    {

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1868)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {

        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1869)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {

        }

        {

        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1870)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1871)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)

        }

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1874)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1875)
    {

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%40;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW26"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");

    }
    if(animhandle==1891)

        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("dynam", 20, 80, 0, 3.5, 3, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1892)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");
    int dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int Vx = getentityproperty(self, "xdir");

    if(y > 1+b && dir == 0 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }else if (y > 1+b && dir == 1 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1893)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");
    int dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int Vx = getentityproperty(self, "xdir");

    if(y > 1+b && dir == 0 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }else if (y > 1+b && dir == 1 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1895)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1896)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams2/boliamsb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1897)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1898)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1899)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1900)

    }
    if(animhandle==1903)
    {

    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+110){
        if(Px <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+110 && P2z <= z+110){
        if(P1x <= x+300 && P2x <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
