      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1914)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1915)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1916)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1917)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1919)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1920)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1921)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%40;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW26"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1922)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1923)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1927)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1928)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW25");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1929)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1930)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW30");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1931)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 2){
      int r = rand()%30;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW32"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW31");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1932)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1933)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1936)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 90, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW29");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(90, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1937)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%40;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW33"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("bomb", 20, 80, 0, 3.5, 3, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1938)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.27);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            shooter2("bomb", 20, 80, 0, 3.5, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1939)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");
    int dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int Vx = getentityproperty(self, "xdir");

    if(y > 1+b && dir == 0 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }else if (y > 1+b && dir == 1 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1940)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");
    int dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int Vx = getentityproperty(self, "xdir");

    if(y > 1+b && dir == 0 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }else if (y > 1+b && dir == 1 ){
      changeentityproperty(self, "direction", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", -Vx, 0, 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1942)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1943)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/linda/lindaw.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1944)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1945)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1946)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1947)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1948)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1951)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1952)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1953)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1954)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1955)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1956)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1957)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1958)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1959)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1962)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1963)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW4");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1964)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW3");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW5");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1965)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW11");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1969)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1970)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1971)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/linda/lindac.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==1972)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1973)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1974)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1975)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1976)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    float x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    float z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz >= z-400){
        if(Px >= x-227){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z >= z-400 && P2z >= z-400){
        if(P1x >= x-227 && P2x >= x-227){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
        } else if(P1x >= x-227 && P2x >= x-587){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
        } else if(P1x >= x-587 && P2x >= x-227){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1979)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1980)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1981)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1982)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1983)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1984)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1985)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1986)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1987)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1990)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1991)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW4");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1992)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW3");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW5");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1993)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW11");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1997)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1998)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==1999)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/linda2/lindawb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2000)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2001)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2002)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2003)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2004)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2007)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2008)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2009)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2010)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2011)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2012)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2013)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2014)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2015)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2018)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2019)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW4");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2020)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW3");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW5");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2021)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW11");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2025)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2026)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2027)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/linda2/lindacb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2028)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2029)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2030)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);

    if(frame==3){

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2031)
    {

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2032)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2035)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2036)
    {

        }

        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }

        {

        }
        if(frame==3)

            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");

        }

        }
        if(frame==6)

        }
        if(frame==7)

        }

        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {

        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2042)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2043)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2046)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2047)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW2");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW4");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2048)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 95, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW3");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW5");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2049)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(95, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW11");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2053)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2054)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2055)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/linda2/lindabk.txt

void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2056)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2057)
    {

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2092)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/linda2/lindabb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2093)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2094)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2095)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2096)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2097)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2099)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2100)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2101)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2103)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2104)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      performattack(self, openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW8"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2105)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, -2.5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("D", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2106)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2107)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2108)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2110)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2111)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2112)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 74, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW23");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(74, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW23");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2114)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%40;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW22"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 74, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(74, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2115)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 74, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW17");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(74, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2116)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 74, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW18");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(74, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2117)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(74, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW13");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2123)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2124)
    {
        if(frame==4)
        {
            attack3(0, 95, 0, 120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW27");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            attack3(0, 95, 0, 120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW27");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            attack3(0, 95, 0, 120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW27");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2125)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW28");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-1.5);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2126)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-1.5);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2127)
    {
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -16, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            shooter2("bomb", 20, 80, 0, 3.5, 3, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2128)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2129)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2136)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2137)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -31, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            shooter2("barel3", 30, 120, 1, 1.5, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/mibobo/mibox.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2186)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2192)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2193)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall3(35, -31, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            shooter2("box3", 30, 120, 1, 1.5, 1, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

}

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2200)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt7(0);
        }
        return;
    }

        }

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/doorst1.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2285)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dooropen2(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW1", "ANI_FOLLOW43");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2286)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dooropen2(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW1", "ANI_FOLLOW43");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dooropen2(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW1", "ANI_FOLLOW43");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2287)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dooropen(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW43");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dooropen(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW43");
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/scrmover5.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2288)
    {

    if(frame==1){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 0);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2289)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int XPos = openborvariant("xpos");
    int Width = openborvariant("levelwidth");
    int Screen = openborvariant("hResolution");

    if(frame==1){
      if(Dir==1){
        if(XPos < Width-Screen && Dir==1){
          changeopenborvariant("xpos", XPos+1);
        } else {
          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
          killentity(self);
        }
      } else if(Dir==0){
        if(XPos > 0){
          changeopenborvariant("xpos", XPos-1);
        } else {
          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
          killentity(self);
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams/williams.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2290)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2291)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2292)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2293)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2294)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(-250, 250, 100, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2295)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2296)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2297)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Hole", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-250, 250, -20, 120, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2298)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(-259, 259, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2299)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);

      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+250){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

        if(P1x <= x+250 && P2x <= x+250){

        }
      }
    }

            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(20, "ANI_FOLLOW38");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(20, "ANI_FOLLOW38");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(20, "ANI_FOLLOW38");
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2363)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            conditionalflip3();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            bind(0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }

    {

      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 4);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintcolor", rgbcolor(230,100,0));
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", rgbcolor(255,104,0));
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 4);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintcolor", rgbcolor(230,100,0));
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", rgbcolor(255,104,0));
    }
    if(frame==4){
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 4);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintcolor", rgbcolor(230,100,0));
    }
    if(frame==5){
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", rgbcolor(255,104,0));
    }
    if(frame==6){
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 4);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintcolor", rgbcolor(230,100,0));
    }
    if(frame==7){
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", rgbcolor(255,104,0));
    }
    if(frame==8){
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 4);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintcolor", rgbcolor(230,100,0));
    }
    if(frame==9){
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", rgbcolor(255,104,0));
    }
    if(frame==10){
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 4);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintcolor", rgbcolor(230,100,0));
    }
    if(frame==11){
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", rgbcolor(255,104,0));
    }
    if(frame==12){
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 4);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintcolor", rgbcolor(230,100,0));
    }
    if(frame==13){
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", rgbcolor(255,104,0));
    }
    if(frame==14){
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 4);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintcolor", rgbcolor(230,100,0));
    }
    if(frame==15){
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintmode", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "tintcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self,"enabled",0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            bind(0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            depost(0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            spawnbind("eflame", -16, 47, 1);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            spawnbind("eeflame", -31, 12, 1);
        }
        if(frame==16)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/bat.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2381)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            move(25, 0, 20);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2384)
    {
        if(frame==3)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper/roper.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2385)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2386)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
