    }
    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
    }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            stopz();
        }

        {
            stopz2();
        }

            degravity(0.27);
        }

        }

            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==5)

            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2391)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      }

      if(Px >= x-60){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW57"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");

      if(P1x >= x-60 && P2x >= x-60){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW57"));
      } else if(P1x >= x-60 && P2x >= x-200){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW57"));
      } else if(P1x >= x-200 && P2x >= x-60){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW57"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            direc(1);
        }
        return;
    }

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/brrow.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2468)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/timer.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2469)
    {
        if(frame==1)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/linda/linda.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2470)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2471)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }

            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(0, 3, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            climbEnd2("U", "ANI_FOLLOW10");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2484)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==2){
      float x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
      float y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
      float z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
      int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
      int LType = getentityvar(self, 2);
      int sx = 5;

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Platform", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "antigravity", 0);

      if(Dir == 0){
        sx = -5;
      }

      if(LType == 2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x, z, y+54);
      } else {
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", x+sx, z-4, y+54);
      }
      setidle(self, openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2485)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/whip.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2535)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            move(25, 0, 50);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            antiwall4(0, -25);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/bolo/bolo.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2538)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2539)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2540)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2541)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2542)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      }

      if(Px <= x+200){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");

      if(P1x <= x+200 && P2x <= x+200){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+200 && P2x <= x+499){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
      } else if(P1x <= x+499 && P2x <= x+200){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2545)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2546)
    {
        if(frame==0)

        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2587)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2588)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt4(5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2589)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt4(5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2590)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            conditionalflip3();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2591)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2592)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2593)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            riseattack(44, 40, "ANI_ATTACK1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2596)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/time.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2598)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");
    float P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
    float P1y = getentityproperty(P1,"a");
    float P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
    float P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
    float P2y = getentityproperty(P2,"a");
    float P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){

      if(P1){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", P1x, P1z, P1y);
      } else if(P2){
        changeentityproperty(self, "position", P2x, P2z, P2y);
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "position", P1x, P1z, P1y);
    }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/cclear5.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2603)
    {

    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int P1Score = getplayerproperty(0,"score");
    int P2Score = getplayerproperty(1,"score");

    if(P1){
      changeplayerproperty(0, "score", P1Score+7000);
    }

    if(P2){
      changeplayerproperty(1, "score", P2Score+7000);
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/scrmover.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2620)
    {

    if(frame==1){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 0);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2621)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int XPos = openborvariant("xpos");
    int Width = openborvariant("levelwidth");
    int Screen = openborvariant("hResolution");

    if(frame==1){
      if(Dir==1){
        if(XPos < Width-Screen && Dir==1){
          changeopenborvariant("xpos", XPos+1);
        } else {
          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
          killentity(self);
        }
      } else if(Dir==0){
        if(XPos > 0){
          changeopenborvariant("xpos", XPos-1);
        } else {
          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
          killentity(self);
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/wall1.txt

    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");

    if(frame==9){
      changeentityproperty(self, "setlayer", 1);
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/bolo/bolo2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2624)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2627)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2628)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2629)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2632)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2634)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2635)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2636)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2637)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            slamstart2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            position(9, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            position(9, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            position(10, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            position(11, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            position(11, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            position(11, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 10, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 10, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 10, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            depost(0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            throw(20, 1, 2, 4, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2638)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%20;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW23"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2639)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW17");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2640)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 2){
      int r = rand()%20;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW23"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW18");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2641)
    {

            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2642)
    {
        if(frame==0)

            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2643)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2647)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2648)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW24");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2659)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            bind(0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            depost(0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2660)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        if(frame==1)
        {
            degravity(0);
        }
        return;
    }

        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2670)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt4(5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2671)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt4(5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2672)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            conditionalflip3();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2673)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2674)

        }
        if(frame==0)

            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)

        }

    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/abobo/abobo.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2679)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2680)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2681)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/delay2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2738)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int  Health = getentityproperty(self, "health");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "health", Health-5);
      if (Health <= 0){
        killentity(self);
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/cclear1.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2740)
    {

    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int P1Score = getplayerproperty(0,"score");
    int P2Score = getplayerproperty(1,"score");

    if(P1){
      changeplayerproperty(0, "score", P1Score+3000);
    }

    if(P2){
      changeplayerproperty(1, "score", P2Score+3000);
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/clear1.txt
########################################

{

    {

      playmusic("DATA/music/ccomplete.ogg", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      killentity(self);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2742)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      killentity(self);
    }
        return;
    }

}

# data/chars/misc/plat1.txt

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/levels/st2/gbelter.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2745)
    {

    void vSelf    = getlocalvar("self");             //Caller.
    void vEntity;                                     //Target entity placeholder.
    int iEntity;                                     //Entity enumeration holder.
    int iType;                                       //Entity type.
    int iMax      = openborvariant("ent_max");       //Entity count.
    int Ex;
    int Ey;
    int Ez;

     //Enumerate and loop through entity collection.
    for(iEntity=0; iEntity<iMax; iEntity++){   
        vEntity = getentity(iEntity);                 //Get target entity from current loop.
        iType   = getentityproperty(vEntity, "type"); //Get target type.

        //Enemy & player type?
        if(iType == openborconstant("TYPE_ENEMY") || iType == openborconstant("TYPE_PLAYER") || iType == openborconstant("TYPE_ITEM")){
          Ex = getentityproperty(vEntity, "x");
          Ey = getentityproperty(vEntity, "a");
          Ez = getentityproperty(vEntity, "z");

          if(Ex >= 2003 && Ex <= 2268 && Ez >= 787 && Ez <= 819 && Ey == 388){
            changeentityproperty(vEntity, "position", Ex+2);
          }
        }
    }
        return;
    }

}

# data/chars/misc/spikeh2.txt

        {
            spikeh(-100, 100, 31, "ANI_FOLLOW50");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            spikeh(-100, 100, 31, "ANI_FOLLOW50");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            spikeh(-100, 100, 31, "ANI_FOLLOW50");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            spikeh(-100, 100, 31, "ANI_FOLLOW50");
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            spikeh(-100, 100, 31, "ANI_FOLLOW50");
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            spikeh(-100, 100, 31, "ANI_FOLLOW50");
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            spikeh(-100, 100, 31, "ANI_FOLLOW50");

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/doorst2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2750)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dooropen2(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW1", "ANI_FOLLOW45");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2751)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dooropen2(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW1", "ANI_FOLLOW45");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dooropen2(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW1", "ANI_FOLLOW45");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2752)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dooropen(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW45");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dooropen(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW45");
        }
        if(frame==19)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/scrmover2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2753)
    {

    if(frame==1){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 0);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2754)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int XPos = openborvariant("xpos");
    int Width = openborvariant("levelwidth");
    int Screen = openborvariant("hResolution");

    if(frame==1){
      if(Dir==1){
        if(XPos < Width-Screen && Dir==1){
          changeopenborvariant("xpos", XPos+1);
        } else {
          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
          killentity(self);
        }
      } else if(Dir==0){
        if(XPos > 0){
          changeopenborvariant("xpos", XPos-1);
        } else {
          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
          killentity(self);
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/itemkill4.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2756)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kill(1411, 600, 110);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            kill(1411, 600, 110);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      playmusic("DATA/music/boss1.ogg", 1, 13073);
    }
    if(frame==4){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);

            conditionalflip3();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2827)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            leaper(1.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2828)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2829)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            riseattack(95, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW27");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2830)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2831)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        if(frame==0)
        {
            bind(0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2832)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2833)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2835)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2836)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

        }
        return;
    }

        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "velocity", 0, 0, -1);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/cclear2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2846)
    {

    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int P1Score = getplayerproperty(0,"score");
    int P2Score = getplayerproperty(1,"score");

    if(P1){
      changeplayerproperty(0, "score", P1Score+4000);
    }

    if(P2){
      changeplayerproperty(1, "score", P2Score+4000);
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/levels/st2b/gbelter2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2851)
    {

    void vSelf    = getlocalvar("self");             //Caller.
    void vEntity;                                     //Target entity placeholder.
    int iEntity;                                     //Entity enumeration holder.
    int iType;                                       //Entity type.
    int iMax      = openborvariant("ent_max");       //Entity count.
    int Ex;
    int Ey;
    int Ez;

     //Enumerate and loop through entity collection.
    for(iEntity=0; iEntity<iMax; iEntity++){   
        vEntity = getentity(iEntity);                 //Get target entity from current loop.
        iType   = getentityproperty(vEntity, "type"); //Get target type.

        //Enemy & player type?
        if(iType == openborconstant("TYPE_ENEMY") || iType == openborconstant("TYPE_PLAYER") || iType == openborconstant("TYPE_ITEM")){
          Ex = getentityproperty(vEntity, "x");
          Ey = getentityproperty(vEntity, "a");
          Ez = getentityproperty(vEntity, "z");

          if(Ex >= 1300 && Ex <= 1821 && Ez >= 1035 && Ez <= 1065 && Ey == 697){
            changeentityproperty(vEntity, "position", Ex-1);
          }
        }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/levels/st2b/gbelter3.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2852)
    {

    void vSelf    = getlocalvar("self");             //Caller.
    void vEntity;                                     //Target entity placeholder.
    int iEntity;                                     //Entity enumeration holder.
    int iType;                                       //Entity type.
    int iMax      = openborvariant("ent_max");       //Entity count.
    int Ex;
    int Ey;
    int Ez;

     //Enumerate and loop through entity collection.
    for(iEntity=0; iEntity<iMax; iEntity++){   
        vEntity = getentity(iEntity);                 //Get target entity from current loop.
        iType   = getentityproperty(vEntity, "type"); //Get target type.

        //Enemy & player type?
        if(iType == openborconstant("TYPE_ENEMY") || iType == openborconstant("TYPE_PLAYER") || iType == openborconstant("TYPE_ITEM")){
          Ex = getentityproperty(vEntity, "x");
          Ey = getentityproperty(vEntity, "a");
          Ez = getentityproperty(vEntity, "z");

          if(Ex >= 1300 && Ex <= 2159 && Ez >= 1065 && Ez <= 1094 && Ey == 697){
            changeentityproperty(vEntity, "position", Ex+1);
          }
        }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/levels/st2b/gbelter4.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2853)
    {

    void vSelf    = getlocalvar("self");             //Caller.
    void vEntity;                                     //Target entity placeholder.
    int iEntity;                                     //Entity enumeration holder.
    int iType;                                       //Entity type.
    int iMax      = openborvariant("ent_max");       //Entity count.
    int Ex;
    int Ey;
    int Ez;

     //Enumerate and loop through entity collection.
    for(iEntity=0; iEntity<iMax; iEntity++){   
        vEntity = getentity(iEntity);                 //Get target entity from current loop.
        iType   = getentityproperty(vEntity, "type"); //Get target type.

        //Enemy & player type?
        if(iType == openborconstant("TYPE_ENEMY") || iType == openborconstant("TYPE_PLAYER") || iType == openborconstant("TYPE_ITEM")){
          Ex = getentityproperty(vEntity, "x");
          Ey = getentityproperty(vEntity, "a");
          Ez = getentityproperty(vEntity, "z");

          if(Ex >= 1300 && Ex <= 2080 && Ez >= 1094 && Ez <= 1124 && Ey == 697){
            changeentityproperty(vEntity, "position", Ex-1);
          }
        }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/delay.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2874)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int  Health = getentityproperty(self, "health");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "health", Health-5);
      if (Health <= 0){
        killentity(self);
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/mibobo/mibobo2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2878)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2881)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2882)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2883)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2886)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2888)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2889)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2890)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2891)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            slamstart2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            position(9, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            position(9, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            position(10, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            position(11, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            position(11, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            position(11, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 10, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 10, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 10, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            depost(0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            throw(20, 1, 2, 4, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2892)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW26");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2894)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%20;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW23"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/linda2/lindab.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==2935)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2936)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==2937)
    {

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/williams2/williamsb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3009)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3010)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3011)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3012)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3013)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3014)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack1(0, 100, 100, "ANI_FOLLOW42");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3015)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+110){
        if(Px <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+110 && P2z <= z+110){
        if(P1x <= x+300 && P2x <= x+300){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3016)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3017)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz >= z-400){
        if(Px >= x-200){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z >= z-400 && P2z >= z-400){
        if(P1x >= x-200 && P2x >= x-200){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
        } else if(P1x >= x-200 && P2x >= x-560){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
        } else if(P1x >= x-560 && P2x >= x-200){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_SPAWN"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }

        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3088)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        if(frame==0)
        {
            bind(0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3089)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3090)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3093)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3094)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/roper2/roperb.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3095)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3096)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3097)
    {

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;

    {

        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 20, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3103)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "subject_to_gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz <= z+100){
        if(Px <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z <= z+100 && P2z <= z+100){
        if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+100 && P2x <= x+640){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        } else if(P1x <= x+640 && P2x <= x+100){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW42"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3104)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/brrow1.txt

{

    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3183)
    {
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/delay11.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3188)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Py;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Py = getentityproperty(P1,"a");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Py = getentityproperty(P2,"a");
      }

      if(Py <= y+400){
        if(Px >= x-500){
          killentity(self);
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1y = getentityproperty(P1,"a");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2y = getentityproperty(P2,"a");

      if(P1y <= y+400 && P2y <= y+400){
        if(P1x >= x-500 && P2x >= x-500){
          killentity(self);
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/itemkill2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3189)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kill2(1500, 600, 170);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            kill2(1500, 600, 170);
        }
        return;
    }

}

        }

        }

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/mibobo/mibobo.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3191)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3192)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3193)
    {

        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            attack3(45, 150, 15, 50, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW27");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            attack3(45, 150, 15, 50, 40, "ANI_FOLLOW27");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            attack3(45, 100, -20, 49, 40, "ANI_ATTACK2");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            riseattack(44, 40, "ANI_ATTACK1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3247)
    {
        if(frame==7)
        {
            riseattack(44, 40, "ANI_ATTACK1");
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            riseattack(44, 40, "ANI_ATTACK1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3250)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/delay7.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3253)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Py;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Py = getentityproperty(P1,"a");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Py = getentityproperty(P2,"a");
      }

      if(Py <= y+110 && Py >= y-5){
        if(Px <= x+519){
          killentity(self); //Suicide!
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1y = getentityproperty(P1,"a");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2y = getentityproperty(P2,"a");

      if(P1y <= y+110 && P1y >= y-5 && P2y <= y+110 && P2y >= y-5){
        if(P1x <= x+519 && P2x <= x+519){
          killentity(self); //Suicide!
        } else if(P1x <= x+519 && P2x <= x+858){
          killentity(self); //Suicide!
        } else if(P1x <= x+858 && P2x <= x+519){
          killentity(self); //Suicide!
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/delay10.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3265)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self,"a");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Py;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Py = getentityproperty(P1,"a");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Py = getentityproperty(P2,"a");
      }

      if(Py <= y+2 && Py >= y-5){
        if(Px >= x-455){
          killentity(self);
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1y = getentityproperty(P1,"a");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2y = getentityproperty(P2,"a");

      if(P1y <= y+2 && P1y >= y-5 && P2y <= y+2 && P2y >= y-5){
        if(P1x >= x-455 && P2x >= x-455){
          killentity(self);
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

# data/chars/abore/abore.txt

void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3267)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/cclear3.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3321)
    {

    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int P1Score = getplayerproperty(0,"score");
    int P2Score = getplayerproperty(1,"score");

    if(P1){
      changeplayerproperty(0, "score", P1Score+5000);
    }

    if(P2){
      changeplayerproperty(1, "score", P2Score+5000);
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/scrmover4.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3325)
    {

    if(frame==1){
      changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 0);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3326)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int Dir = getentityproperty(self, "direction");
    int XPos = openborvariant("xpos");
    int Width = openborvariant("levelwidth");
    int Screen = openborvariant("hResolution");

    if(frame==1){
      if(Dir==1){
        if(XPos < Width-Screen && Dir==1){
          changeopenborvariant("xpos", XPos+1);
        } else {
          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
          killentity(self);
        }
      } else if(Dir==0){
        if(XPos > 0){
          changeopenborvariant("xpos", XPos-1);
        } else {
          changelevelproperty("scrollspeed", 1);
          killentity(self);
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/doorst3ab.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3327)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dooropen2(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW1", "ANI_FOLLOW45");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3328)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dooropen2(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW1", "ANI_FOLLOW45");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dooropen2(-40, 40, -10, 0, 0, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW1", "ANI_FOLLOW45");
        }
        return;
    }

        if(frame==1)

        }
        if(frame==19)
        {
            changeentityproperty(getlocalvar("self"), "animation", openborconstant("ANI_IDLE"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/oharra/oharra.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3341)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3342)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3343)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }

        }

        }
        return;
    }

        }

    }

    {

      int r = rand()%20;

        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW23"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)

            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");

        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3360)
    {

      }

      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
