#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/delay6.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3399)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self,"a");
    int Dir = getentityproperty(self,"direction");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Py;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Py = getentityproperty(P1,"a");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Py = getentityproperty(P2,"a");
      }

      if(Py <= y+2 && Py >= y-5){
        if(Dir==0 && Px <= x+1000){
          killentity(self); //Suicide!
        } else if(Dir==1 && Px >= x-1000){
          killentity(self); //Suicide!
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1y = getentityproperty(P1,"a");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2y = getentityproperty(P2,"a");

      if(P1y <= y+2 && P1y >= y-5 && P2y <= y+2 && P2y >= y-5){
        if(Dir==0 && P1x <= x+1000 && P2x <= x+1000){
          killentity(self); //Suicide!
        } else if(Dir==1 && P1x >= x-1000 && P2x >= x-1000){
          killentity(self); //Suicide!
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/delay4.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3400)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dooropen3(0, 518, 400, 0, 2, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dooropen3(0, 518, 400, 0, 2, "ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3401)
    {
        if(frame==1)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/wall3.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3402)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==9){
      changeentityproperty(self, "setlayer", 1);
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/oharra/oharra2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3404)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==2){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3407)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3408)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3409)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3412)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            dash(1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            degravity(-0.50);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3414)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3415)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3416)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3417)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            slamstart2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            position(9, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            position(9, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            position(10, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            position(11, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            position(11, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            position(11, 56, 1, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 10, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 10, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 10, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, -1, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            antiwall3(-65, 5, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            position(12, -63, 86, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            depost(0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            throw(20, 1, 2, 4, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3418)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 0){
      int r = rand()%20;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW23"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW16");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3419)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW17");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW20");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3420)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if( frame == 2){
      int r = rand()%20;

      if( r > 0){
        changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW23"));
      }
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW18");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW21");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3421)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3422)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3423)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW22");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3427)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    int x = getentityproperty(self, "x");
    int y = getentityproperty(self, "a");
    int z = getentityproperty(self, "z");
    int b = getentityproperty(self, "base");

    if(y >= 1+b){
      changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_WALKOFF"));
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            dasher(2);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3428)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW24");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3439)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            bind(0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            depost(0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3440)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    changeentityproperty(self, "velocity", 0, 0, 0);
        if(frame==1)
        {
            degravity(0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3445)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3446)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3447)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3448)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3449)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            antiwall4(-20, "ANI_FOLLOW37");
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3450)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt4(5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3451)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            hurt4(5);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3452)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            conditionalflip3();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3453)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3454)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3455)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            riseattack(44, 40, "ANI_ATTACK1");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3458)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stop();
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            stop();
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/jumper.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3459)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            jum(0, 30, 120, 0, 1);
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/burnov/burnov.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3460)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3461)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3462)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3463)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -20, 120, 700, "ANI_SPAWN");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3464)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");
    int z = getentityproperty(self,"z");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;
      int Pz;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
        Pz = getentityproperty(P2,"z");
      }

      if(Pz >= z-400){
        if(Px >= x-329){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW56"));
        }
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P1z = getentityproperty(P1,"z");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      int P2z = getentityproperty(P2,"z");

      if(P1z >= z-400 && P2z >= z-400){
        if(P1x >= x-329 && P2x >= x-329){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW56"));
        } else if(P1x >= x-329 && P2x >= x-689){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW56"));
        } else if(P1x >= x-689 && P2x >= x-329){
          changeentityproperty(self, "animation", openborconstant("ANI_FOLLOW56"));
        }
      }
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3465)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
      playmusic("DATA/music/boss2.ogg", 1, 65201);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3467)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            clearL();
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3468)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3469)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3470)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            stopz2();
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(0.27);
        }

        }

        }

        }

        }
        return;
    }

        }

    }

        }

        }

        }

        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            position(13, 73, 17, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            antiwall3(75, -15, 0);
        }
        if(frame==2)

            position(13, 73, 17, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)

        }

        }
        if(frame==6)

        if(frame==13)

        }
        if(frame==14)

        }
        if(frame==14)
        {
            position(17, 73, 17, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==15)

            depost(0);
        }
        if(frame==15)
        {
            throw(0, 3, -2, 3, 0, 0);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3479)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            kickreact(0, 120, 0, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW18");
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(120, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW18");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3481)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            riseattack3(170, 45, "ANI_FOLLOW19");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            dasher(4.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            dasher(4.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==4)
        {
            dasher(4.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==5)
        {
            dasher(4.5, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            dasher(4, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==7)
        {
            dasher(3, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==8)
        {
            dasher(3, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==9)
        {
            dasher(2, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==10)
        {
            dasher(2, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==11)
        {
            dasher(1, 0, 0);
        }

      changedrawmethod(self, "fillcolor", 0);
      changedrawmethod(self,"enabled",0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {

        if(frame==16)

            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/cclear4.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3509)
    {

    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int P1Score = getplayerproperty(0,"score");
    int P2Score = getplayerproperty(1,"score");

    if(P1){
      changeplayerproperty(0, "score", P1Score+6000);
    }

    if(P2){
      changeplayerproperty(1, "score", P2Score+6000);
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/clear4.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3510)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      playmusic("DATA/music/ccomplete.ogg", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      killentity(self);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3511)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      killentity(self);
    }
        return;
    }

}

{

    }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            killentity(getlocalvar("self"));
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/jeff/jeff2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3527)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3528)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);

        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");

        if(frame==1)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==2)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            walljump(15, 110, "ANI_FOLLOW6");
        }
        if(frame==3)
        {
            climberD2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW7");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3539)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-1);
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3541)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    setlocalvar("Pain" + self, 0);
    setentityvar(self, 5, NULL());
        if(frame==0)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {
            climber2(20, 20, "ANI_FOLLOW9");
        }

        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/jeff/jeff5.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3608)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3609)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3610)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3611)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3612)
    {
        if(frame==0)
        {
            attack3(-200, 200, -70, 60, 700, "ANI_FOLLOW56");
        }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3613)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==5){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);

        if(frame==6)
        {
            spawnbind("eeflame", -31, 12, 1);
        }
        if(frame==16)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/delay8.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3689)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");
    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int Play = openborvariant("count_players");
    int x = getentityproperty(self,"x");

    if(Play==1 && (P1 || P2)){
      int Px;

      if(P1){
        Px = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      } else if(P2){
        Px = getentityproperty(P2,"x");
      }

      if(Px <= x+518){
        killentity(self); //Suicide!
      }
    } else if(Play==2 && P1 && P2){
      int P1x = getentityproperty(P1,"x");
      int P2x = getentityproperty(P2,"x");

      if(P1x <= x+518 && P2x <= x+518){
        killentity(self); //Suicide!
      } else if(P1x <= x+518 && P2x <= x+838){
        killentity(self); //Suicide!
      } else if(P1x <= x+838 && P2x <= x+518){
        killentity(self); //Suicide!
      }
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/burnov/burnov2.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3732)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3733)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3734)
    {

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/chin/chin.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3778)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3779)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 0);
    }
    if(frame==3){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3780)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Gravity", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 0);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 0);

      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_Wall", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MinZ", 1);
      changeentityproperty(self, "Subject_to_MaxZ", 1);
    }
        return;

      changedrawmethod(self,"enabled",0);
    }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            degravity(-0.15);
        }
        if(frame==0)
        {
            bind(0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
        }
        if(frame==0)

            depost(0);
        }
        if(frame==1)
        {

        }
        if(frame==6)
        {
            spawnbind("eeflame", -31, 12, 1);
        }
        if(frame==16)
        {
            anichange("ANI_FOLLOW1");
        }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/cclear6.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3832)
    {

    void P1 = getplayerproperty(0, "entity");
    void P2 = getplayerproperty(1, "entity");
    int P1Score = getplayerproperty(0,"score");
    int P2Score = getplayerproperty(1,"score");

    if(P1){
      changeplayerproperty(0, "score", P1Score+8000);
    }

    if(P2){
      changeplayerproperty(1, "score", P2Score+8000);
    }
        return;
    }

}

#### animationscript function main #####
# data/chars/misc/clear6.txt
########################################
void main()
{
    int frame = getlocalvar("frame");
    int animhandle = getlocalvar("animhandle");
    if(animhandle==3833)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==0){
      playmusic("DATA/music/ccomplete.ogg", 0);
    }
    if(frame==1){
      killentity(self);
    }
        return;
    }
    if(animhandle==3834)
    {

    void self = getlocalvar("self");

    if(frame==1){
      killentity(self);
    }
        return;
    }

}
